defaultSampleTexts: I'm excited to share that I've started a new position at Lumo Company! I've worked very hard to achieve this, and I will do my best to develop amazing AI tools.
I hope this app wins the hackathon organized by Google. It has great potential to accomplish a lot with local AI.

I dislike constantly copying and pasting text into Google Translate just to check for errors or misused phrases. It's frustrating! We all know that one spelling error on the internet can discredit even the best argument.
